description:
When a vivacious single step mom brings home another one night stand, her dark date becomes fixated on subjugating the mom and her innocent, submissive step daughter to his bizarre sexual fetishes.
Darling is the anal sex obsessed mom that promises anything to Mark Wood. Mark takes her at her word, and coerces mommy's sexy step daughter, Tiffany Watson, into submitting to his bizarre rough sex fetishes.
This update includes coerced three way sex, hot girls being made to do dirty things to each other, gags, bondage, nipple clamps, rough anal sex and mommy - step daughter sex themes.
title: Mommy's Slutty Sacrifice
